results.text: Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
results.reason: God's Word guiding our daily lives.
results.reflection: In a world of darkness, let God's Word illuminate your path.

results.text: Give us today our daily bread.
results.reflection: Trust God to provide for your needs each day.

results.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.

results.text: Do not merely listen to the word, and so deceive yourselves. Do what it says.
results.reflection: Live out the truth of God's Word in your daily actions.
